short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wrap github textareas for proper mail columns

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Github TextWrapper is an extension that runs on github to transform all textareas to use jquery.textWrapper.js ( http://oelmekki.github.io/jquery.textWrapper.js/ ).

This plugins automatically wrap text for proper email formatting, setting column width to 72 characters.

Autowrapping can be disabled or manually triggered. See documentation for more information.
